page.title: 07Stuck In The Snow
page.content: On Thursday 17th of January 1985 when some of primary 6 and 7s went orienteering in the snow. There were 2 other schools went as well. When we got there we got stuck in the snow at{Mabie Forest}so we had to sit in the back of the bus while {Eaglesfield}pushed the bus out of the snow.After a while we got out of the bus and went down to our starting point. When we came back to the bus it was stuck again but in a differant place. So the teacher got out and pushed the bus.Once they had got the bus out it went flying into the wall we all screamed but we came back to school alright. BY ALISON JOHNSTON AND DIANE WARRICK.
